name: Farmland! [Beta]
description:
/!\ Game is still in developpment. It will recieve big updates in the future.

Welcome to Farmland, stranger! Have you ever feld bored of your desk job, wanting to leave everything behind, buy a plot of land in the middle of nowhere and get farming? No? Well me neither but Farmland is exactly that!

Farmland is a fun and relaxing little game in which you can do plenty of things people in the countryside do,  like never seeing anyone, walking around and exploiting land of course! If you decide to purchase the early version of this, you can grow 17 different crops, with various growth times, watering needs and collection methods. You are also provided with a set of tools to help you redesign the land around you, by making exploitable fields, placing buildings and furnitures to make the surroundings better!

If you have any questions, suggestions or advice, feel free to contact me on twitter (@_Guereak_) or reddit (u/Guereak)

Have fun!
